name: Space Nations - Battlearena
description: A Space Nations Battlearena is a video game that blends the survival, space simulator, exploration and scavenging elements of a survival game with last-man-standing gameplay which challenges a large number of players, starting with minimal equipment, to search for weapons and armor and eliminate all other opponents while avoiding being trapped outside of a shrinking "safe area", with the winner being the last competitor in the game.
